Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelper
public class DatabaseHelper extends Object
The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes.

    • ensureConnected

      public void ensureConnected() throws SQLException
      This method ensures that the database connection is open. If the connection is null or closed, it will attempt to reconnect.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllUsers

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getAllUsers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all users from the database.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of User objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(String userName)
      Deletes a user from the database based on their userName.

      Note: This method will not delete an admin user.

      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if a user was deleted, false otherwise.

      public List<String[]> getRestrictedUsers() throws SQLException
      Gets a list of all users that have the Restricted flag in their role.
      Returns:
      A list of restricted users, where each element is an array of [username, firstName, lastName, role]
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • hasUserRequestedAdminAccess

      public boolean hasUserRequestedAdminAccess(String username) throws SQLException
      Checks if a user has already requested admin access and the request is pending
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check
      Returns:
      true if the user has a pending request, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • isUserRequestApproved

      public boolean isUserRequestApproved(String username) throws SQLException
      Checks if a user's admin access request was approved
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check
      Returns:
      true if the user has an approved request, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • addClosedAdminRequest

      public void addClosedAdminRequest(String username, String reason, String date) throws SQLException
      Adds a record to closed admin requests when admin privileges are removed
      Parameters:
      username - The username whose admin privileges were removed
      reason - The reason for removing admin privileges
      date - The date when admin privileges were removed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • reopenAdminRequest

      public void reopenAdminRequest(int requestId) throws SQLException
      Reopens a closed admin request
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the request to reopen
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • updateAdminRequestDescription

      public void updateAdminRequestDescription(int requestId, String description) throws SQLException
      Updates the description of an admin request
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the request to update
      description - The new description
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • normalizeAdminRoles

      public void normalizeAdminRoles() throws SQLException
      Updates existing lowercase 'admin' roles to capitalized 'Admin' for consistency This should be called during application startup to ensure all roles are properly capitalized
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getAdminRequestById

      public Request getAdminRequestById(int requestId) throws SQLException
      Gets a specific admin access request by ID
      Parameters:
      requestId - The ID of the request to get
      Returns:
      The request object, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
